segments.text: I can hear the sound of water sloshing as it pours over the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s messy, and it makes me feel uneasy watching it overflow like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains focused on her plate, completely unconcerned by the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of frustration; why can’t she just turn off the faucet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are in a world of their own, too; they seem entirely absorbed in their cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how they view the woman’s indifference; do they think she's oblivious or just really focused?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s all so surreal; the chaos inside starkly contrasts the calm of the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR
